name: Diveball
description:
A small project I worked on a while ago. Plays like Pinball, but you're able to move freely across four interconnected tables by breaking the glass walls between them.

There is currently no end state to the project, so play as long as you'd like. Try to set a new high score or - if you're willing to challenge yourself - reach all four tables in one game.

Controls:
Press SPACE
